title: Suggest me YT channels for engineering 1st yr
content:

comments.body: Ur fucked. I was about to fail in physics. Just follow the match av videos from pesu academy. I scored more than 90% in math just solve all variants of the problems. Physics was a nightmare i was lucky enough to pass the test.
